review: Before my son got me the FireStick about a month ago I did not take advantage of my Prime membership like I wanted to because of the inconvenience of dragging my laptop in and hooking up to my computer every time I wanted to watch something.  Now that I don't have to do that I am watching more movies and taking advantage of more of the benefits, such as listening to all the music available to me.  I love it. I no longer have cable so this works out perfectly for me as it works with Sling TV, HuluPlus, etc. I also love the beautiful background scenery. Possibilities seem endless.

review: I love my Roku's, but after a couple years they both stopped working. I have a ChromeCast but obviously it doesn't provide Amazon Prime. Given the price and the faster CPU / more RAM, the Fire TV Stick was a reasonable risk. It's turned out to be amazing. It's the first TV device that's actually fun. The voice search, via the phone app, is extremely good. You really can play games on it. I always wondered why Netflix looked better on the WiiU than my older Roku - the network was the same. Now I understand streaming video quality is controlled both by network speed and CPU power. That's where the faster, more powerful guts of the Fire stick shines. Video is perfect. This is a great device. Obviously being sold under cost. I would get one while they're still priced to create a market. Oh, I was surprised that I could not run it off the USB on the TV -- not enough power. I guess faster CPU means you need a bit more power. I expect TV makers will adjust accordingly.

review: Great streaming device.  So many choices of apps, movies, games, TV shows.  Setup took 5 minutes.  Anyone who is a prime member, this is a must! I'm not a prime member but may join.  For those that have to rent a movie or TV show, my only suggestion is to lower the rental cost.  We use the Fire TV Stick almost daily.  There are many free apps to install also.  It's great how Amazon syncs everything across devices.  I can install a Fire Stick app on my office computer and it downloads to my Fire Stick immediately.  Another huge benefit, it's portable!
